overview: Derek Rillix is a Nerd Hunter, a special officer assigned to hunt down and delete anyone engaged in illegal "NERD" activities. Rillix knows that the underground nerd movement, led by MasterGeek, are planning a massive comic book convention. Rillix is bent on stopping this, but something is gnawing away deep inside him, a deep secret that even he cannot face.
tagline: Once, Nerds were cool. Then they brought the world to the brink of destruction. Now...Nerds are illegal!
title: Nerd Hunter 3004
